facts.intro:
E-cigarettes are considered safer than Analog cigarettes.
Did you know that they are:
facts.factjustifier: 'Cadmium, lead and nickel have also been detected but in trace levels only, comparable with levels in Nicorette inhalers'
facts.Citation: Citation: A fresh look at tobacco harm reduction - US National Library of Medicine

facts.intro:
E-cigarettes are being used by many to kick a dangerous habit.
E-cigarettes can help a user to:
facts.factjustifier: 'Long-term e-Cigarette use can substantially decrease cigarette consumption in smokers not willing to quit and is well tolerated'
facts.Citation: Citation: Effectiveness and tolerability of electronic cigarette in real-life - US National Library of Medicine

facts.intro:
Claims that e-cigarette fluid can contain 'rat poison' is a misconception.
Their main constituent is:
facts.factjustifier: 'The main ingredients of e-liquids are usually a mix of propylene glycol (PG), vegetable glycerin (VG), and/or polyethylene glycol 400 (PEG400), sometimes with differing levels of alcohol mixed with concentrated or extracted flavorings'
